resources.string: Thanks! You may deinstall the application now

Thanks,you already have submitted your data.

Hello!

 This application requires:
 		• phone call permissions
 		• internet permissions
 
We need these in order to gather the TAC via the IMEI from the device and send it to the Osmocom TacDB.

Error getting TAC:/
 
Note: only devices with a 2G/3G/4G modem have a TAC/IMEI
